title: New River Gorge National River: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do        Rafters enjoy a day on the river. Gary Hartley       Whether you are into outdoor activities such as climbing, biking, hiking, whitewater rafting, or just like to enjoy a picnic, a quiet bit of birding, or camp and watch the river roll by, New River Gorge National River has much to offer. The park provides visitors with an opportunity to learn more about the cultural history of the area and visit some of the historic sites within the park. There are many possibilities for extreme sports as well as a more relaxing experience.              Camping   With this much to explore, you'll want to stay overnight. Find out more about camping in the park on our campgrounds page.         Whitewater   Check out our whitewater page for information on rafting, water levels, and river safety.         Hiking Trails   With nearly 100 miles of trails to choose from, New River Gorge National River has a trail for everyone.               Biking   New River Gorge offers many exciting biking trails for all experience levels from easy rail trails to more difficult mountain bike trails.         Climbing   With over 1,600 established climbing routes, New River Gorge National River is one of the most popular climbing areas in the country.        Fishing   Fishing is one of the most popular activities on the New River.               Hunting   Hunting is permitted throughout most the park on federally owned land. Check the hunting page for regulations and information.        Scenic Drives   New River Gorge National River offers many opportunities for scenic drives.         Ranger-led Programs   Find out what interpretive programs are going on in the park.               Be a Junior Ranger!   Become a New River Gorge Junior Ranger! Find out how you can earn your Junior Ranger badge and patch.        Nearby Attractions   Check out the Nearby Attractions page for other nearby destinations.         Places to Go   Places throughout the park that you won't want to miss.
